name: Al-Iksir
description:
A 2019 GameChef entry!

Theme: AMALGAM

combination, creation, alchemy, metallurgy, the blending of two things to create a new third

Ingredient #1: Failure

loss, defeat, unforseen circumstances, unfortunate or unexpected outcomes

Ingredient #2: Microscopic

atomic, science, building blocks, tiny in scope but vast in consequence

Ingredient #3: Levitate

fly, float, elation, success, confidence, travel

Ingredient #4: Secret

hidden, concealed, private, competition

Al-Iksir is a collaborative horror game for three to seven players about a cadre of Sorceror-Thanes maintaining their fel grip on immortality. To play, one person plays the Record-Keeper (or simply Keeper), who takes the role of the greater world, while everyone else takes on the role of the Sorceror-Thanes.
